organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: EU , Poland agree on oil import tariffs .

| --- |
| EU |
| Poland |

The two "Organization" entities in the paragraph are "EU" and "Poland". The "EU" refers to the European Union, an economic and political union of 27 European countries. "Poland" is a country located in Central Europe. The paragraph discusses an agreement between these two organizations regarding oil import tariffs.
